recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with spices
2. Cook chicken until tender
3. Make tomato gravy with butter
4. Add cooked chicken to gravy
5. Add cream and simmer
6. Serve with rice or naan

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.instructions:
1. Blanch spinach and make puree
2. Cut paneer into cubes
3. Cook onions until golden
4. Add spinach puree and spices
5. Add paneer cubes gently
6. Add cream and simmer
7. Serve hot with roti

recipes.name: Biryani
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak rice for 30 minutes
2. Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
3. Cook meat until 70% done
4. Boil rice until 70% cooked
5. Layer rice and meat alternately
6. Top with fried onions
7. Cook on dum for 45 minutes
8. Serve with raita
